des:
ABOUT THIS SKILL
zosi smart cameras are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the zosi smart app on your smartphone or computer.

With the skill zosi smart Camera and Alexa, you can now interact with your zosi smart cameras by voice. 

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your zosi smart account* and discover your zosi smart cameras. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa: https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=hp_left_v4_sib?nodeId=201749240

When using the skill, you will need to create names for your devices. There are two ways to create these names:

1. Use the names you previously set up. This will be shown in the zosi smart app and can be changed.

2. Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add devices to that group. 

More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group: https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=hp_left_v4_sib?ie=UTF8&nodeId=201749250

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show me bedroom camera"
"Alexa, show the office camera"

*To use this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the zosi smart app.

Compatible zosi smart Cameras:
-zosi smart nvr 1080p Home Camera*
-zosi smart Camera* 
*Requires firmware update
